pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

related.meaning: taking an examination (esp. for entrance to a school or university)

lessons.japanese: 外国に行くと我々は大抵カルチャーショックを体験する。
lessons.english: In a foreign country most of us go through culture shock.

lessons.japanese: ラクダの旅は全く素晴らしい体験だった。
lessons.english: Our journey by camel was quite an experience.

lessons.japanese: ボブは戦争中多くの危険を体験した。
lessons.english: Bob went through many dangers during the war.

lessons.japanese: どうかあなたの実体験のことを書いて下さい。
lessons.english: Please write about your real experience.

lessons.japanese: 実体験をお書きください。
lessons.english: Please write about your real experience.

lessons.japanese: 体験談を書いてください。
lessons.english: Please write about your real experience.

lessons.japanese: その話は彼自身の体験に基づいている。
lessons.english: The story is based on his own experience.

lessons.japanese: その話が彼の体験に基づいているという証拠はない。
lessons.english: There is no evidence that the story is based on his own experience.

lessons.japanese: その洪水は彼らが体験したうちで最大の災害だった。
lessons.english: The flood was the greatest disaster they had ever had.

lessons.japanese: こんなにすてきな体験が出来て私はなんて幸せなんでしょう。
lessons.english: I'm really happy to have had such a great time.

lessons.japanese: この体験はいつも私の記憶に残っているでしょう。
lessons.english: This experience will always remain in my memory.

lessons.japanese: この事は私自身の体験から言っているのです。
lessons.english: I say this from my own experience.

lessons.japanese: あなたは子供の頃楽しい体験をたくさんしましたか。
lessons.english: Did you have a lot of happy experiences in your childhood?
